participant_1.background:
I'm constantly daydreaming about my future acting career and the perfect romantic partner, which leads me to procrastinate on my current projects.
I'm not in a relationship, but I'm content with my life.
I haven't seen my family in years, but I'd love to buy a mobile for their nursery.
i have male pattern baldness.
this past summer i hiked the appalachian trail.

participant_2.background:
I am more concerned with my creations than my appearance.
i live alone with my dog.
I have started baking for my family and friends.
one of my favorite artists is drake.
my mother is a school teacher.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for fun?
I like to spend time in my home studio creating things. What do you enjoy doing?
I love to hike and travel. I just got back from a trip to Peru.
That sounds awesome! I love to travel too. I've never been to Peru, but I'd love to go.
It was amazing! I hiked the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu. It was one of the most challenging and rewarding experiences of my life.
That's so cool! I've heard great things about Machu Picchu. I'd love to do that hike one day.
You should! It's a once in a lifetime experience.
I'm sure it is. I'll have to start saving up for my trip.
I'm sure it will be worth it.
I'm sure it will be.
So, what do you like to create in your studio?
I like to make jewelry and pottery. I also paint and draw.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to make jewelry.
It's not too hard to learn. There are a lot of great tutorials online.
I'll have to check them out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is.
So, what are you doing for the rest of the week?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a hike or just relax at home.
Sounds like a good plan. I'm going to keep working on my projects.
Have fun!
Thanks! You too!
